title: The offsite infrastructure like road, water supply, sewerage treatment plant having zero discharge shall be developed by land owner at his own cost, unless this infrastructure is provided by Authority
clause_text: The offsite infrastructure like road, water supply, sewerage treatment plant having zero discharge shall be developed by land owner at his own cost, unless this infrastructure is provided by Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
